member.name: IDeskBar.GetClient
member.param: The address of a pointer to a variable of type that receives the client used by the desk bar.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if the client object is returned, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: IDeskBar.OnPosRectChangeDB
member.summary: Notifies the object that the rectangle has changed.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that specifies the child bar's desired size.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise.

member.name: IDeskBar.SetClient
member.summary: Sets the client specified by punkClient.
member.param: A pointer to a variable of type that specifies the client used by the desk bar.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
